languages.text: {n}Девушка рядом с вами — все равно что бездушная статуя, безупречная в своей безжизненности. Единственная эмоция в ней — ледяной ужас во взгляде, устремленном на чадящего Фесмофориуса.{/n}
{n}The young woman next to you could well be a carved statue, perfect in its lifelessness. The only emotion in her gaze, directed at the smoking Phesmophorius, is ice-cold terror.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Девушка рядом с вами — все равно что бездушная статуя, безупречная в своей безжизненности. Единственная эмоция в ней — ледяной ужас во взгляде, устремленном на чадящего Фесмофориуса.{/n}

languages.text: {n}梅芙静静地站在你身边，仿佛石雕一样，没有任何生命的迹象。她凝视着冒着烟的菲斯摩弗瑞斯，目光中唯一的情感，便是冰冷的恐惧。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman next to you could well be a carved statue, perfect in its lifelessness. The only emotion in her gaze, directed at the smoking Phesmophorius, is ice-cold terror.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}梅芙静静地站在你身边，仿佛石雕一样，没有任何生命的迹象。她凝视着冒着烟的菲斯摩弗瑞斯，目光中唯一的情感，便是冰冷的恐惧。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La muchacha que está a tu lado bien podría ser una estatua, de lo quieta y tiesa que está. La única emoción que expresa su mirada, clavada en el humeante fesmoforio, es un pánico cerval.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman next to you could well be a carved statue, perfect in its lifelessness. The only emotion in her gaze, directed at the smoking Phesmophorius, is ice-cold terror.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La muchacha que está a tu lado bien podría ser una estatua, de lo quieta y tiesa que está. La única emoción que expresa su mirada, clavada en el humeante fesmoforio, es un pánico cerval.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yanındaki genç kadın; cansızlığında mükemmel olan, oyulmuş bir heykel pekâlâ olabilirdi. Dumanı tüten Pesmoforyus'a yönelen bakışlarındaki tek duygunun buz gibi bir dehşet olduğunu görüyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman next to you could well be a carved statue, perfect in its lifelessness. The only emotion in her gaze, directed at the smoking Phesmophorius, is ice-cold terror.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yanındaki genç kadın; cansızlığında mükemmel olan, oyulmuş bir heykel pekâlâ olabilirdi. Dumanı tüten Pesmoforyus'a yönelen bakışlarındaki tek duygunun buz gibi bir dehşet olduğunu görüyorsun.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの隣にいる若い女性はその生気のなさにおいて完璧な彫刻像になる可能性が高い。彼女の目にある唯一の感情は、煙を出しているフェスモフォリウスに向けられており、氷のように冷たい恐怖である。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman next to you could well be a carved statue, perfect in its lifelessness. The only emotion in her gaze, directed at the smoking Phesmophorius, is ice-cold terror.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの隣にいる若い女性はその生気のなさにおいて完璧な彫刻像になる可能性が高い。彼女の目にある唯一の感情は、煙を出しているフェスモフォリウスに向けられており、氷のように冷たい恐怖である。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Parfaitement immobile, la jeune femme à vos côtés est aussi inerte qu'une statue de marbre. Une froide terreur, telle est la seule émotion qui transparaît dans son regard rivé sur le Phesmophorius fumant.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman next to you could well be a carved statue, perfect in its lifelessness. The only emotion in her gaze, directed at the smoking Phesmophorius, is ice-cold terror.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Parfaitement immobile, la jeune femme à vos côtés est aussi inerte qu'une statue de marbre. Une froide terreur, telle est la seule émotion qui transparaît dans son regard rivé sur le Phesmophorius fumant.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die junge Frau neben dir könnte eine geschnitzte Statue sein, so regungslos steht sie da. Die einzige Regung in ihrem Blick, der auf den qualmenden Phesmophorius gerichtet ist, ist blankes Entsetzen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman next to you could well be a carved statue, perfect in its lifelessness. The only emotion in her gaze, directed at the smoking Phesmophorius, is ice-cold terror.{/n}
